attributes.action: super furry animals reunion gig in wales for us fans to enjoy
attributes.additional_details: it's been 4 years since the 'super furry animals' last played a gig on home soil. we, the fans, feel that it's been far too long and we're all getting withdrawal symptoms. we all need a mighty injection of "the man don't give a f**k" ASAP to cure us all... so sort it out trev... lots of love, Pajy
